column1: The Petitioner stated that he attended to work on 03.06.2010, which was established through the
attendance  register  marked  and  produced  as  පෙ-17.  In  this  instance,  Court  observes  that  the
Petitioner did not give any reason why he had left the workplace in the morning.
Furthermore, it is relevant to note that the said attendance register පෙ-17 indicates on 03.06.2010,
it is minuted that “පෙට (04 දා) සිට M.T.M. ෙරීඩ් පෙහි අත්සන් ප ොකල යුතුය”.
